page.title: 06The Supernatural in Stockton
page.content: One of the ghosts in this area is the Blue Lady. She inhabits Stockton Manor.She has an unlikely story behind her but it could be true.A young girl was said to walking to a party at Stockton Manor one Christmas Eve.She was wearing a blue dress.A car came speeding down the drive and she was knocked down.She was all right but some dogs tore her apart.They say her blood still stains the doorstep.Every Christmas eve her ghost appears at approximately 11.30 pm and then disappears at midnight.All you can see of her is her blue head and neck. She is all in blue including a blue pendant. Also in Stockton there is a swing which moves by its self.A boy was killed on it and ever since then its been haunted.
